home_title: Forever begins with a single beautiful moment captured
home_quote: Capturing the magic of weddings, maternity, and special events with a creative eye. Turning real moments into timeless, elegant photographs you'll cherish forever. Dedicated to making your memories last a lifetime.
about_section_1_text: I'm a passionate photographer with a love for capturing life's most beautiful moments. With years of experience in weddings, maternity, and special events, I strive to create timeless images that tell your unique story.
about_section_2_text_1: To create a visual narrative that reflects your unique story and personality.
about_section_2_text_2: Whether it's a wedding, maternity shoot, or a private event, I aim to capture the essence of each moment with creativity and elegance.
about_section_3_text: If you're interested in working together or have any questions, feel free to reach out through the contact form below.
packages_intro: Choose from a variety of packages tailored to your needs and budget.
package_weddings_desc: Essential coverage for your event, capturing all the key moments with style and elegance.
package_maternity_desc: Extended coverage, more photos, and extra edits to ensure every detail is remembered.
package_restaurants_desc: The full experience: all-day coverage, premium albums, and a personalized photo session.
client_1_feedback: Hey ellie, omg wow! Thank you so much for being there today and taking all those pictures and capturing all our memories it was such a treat and pleasure having you witness it all. I can't express how much everyone loved having you there and taking our shots they were complimenting you so much I'm so so glad it was you! Was lovely meeting you and your aura I absolutely loved it hoping to see you again soon thank you once again Xx
client_2_feedback: Ellie's attention to detail is absolutely incredible, from directing the poses and choosing the most stunning locations to even twisting our jewellery round the right way for us, she just absolutely smashes it, and you can see the passion in the pictures.Ellie makes you feel so confident throughout her shoots bringing out the best in you and is so comfortable to be around, her energy is just brilliant. Thank you so much for creating these special memories for us ellie. They are perfect in every way
client_3_feedback: Ellie has been one of the most amazing photographers I've come across, she showed great professionalism in chaotic environments, and was very accommodating and understanding of different cultures. The shots came out amazing and they captured every special moment perfectly. I can't recommend her enough.
location_intro: You can find me at various locations for shoots, including:
location_text: I'm based near Bedford and I'm willing to travel X km.
footer_text: Els Social Spark. All rights reserved.
contact_intro: If you have any questions or would like to book a session, please reach out!
contact_info_social: Follow me on social media for updates and more photos!
contact_info_response_time: Please allow 24-48 hours for a response.
gallery_intro: Explore our collection of stunning photographs.
gallery_no_images: No images found for this gallery.
login_logged_in_message: You are logged in and can now upload images to the gallery. Simply head to the gallery page to get started.

restaurants_intro: Elevate your restaurant’s online presence with professional photography and video content tailored for social media. Whether you need a one-off boost or ongoing support, our packages are designed to showcase your food, drinks, interiors, and team in the best light—helping you attract new customers and engage your audience.
restaurants_1month_list_1: 1 full content shoot (on location, up to 3 hours)
restaurants_1month_list_2: 30 high quality edited photos (food, drinks, interiors, staff, BTS)
restaurants_3month_list_1: 3 content shoots (1 per month, up to 3 hours each)
restaurants_3month_list_2: 100+ high quality edited photos over 3 months
restaurants_3month_list_5: Custom content calendar for social media use
weddings_intro: Capture the magic of your special day with our tailored wedding photography packages. Whether you want a full day of coverage or just the essentials, we have options to suit every need and budget. Our goal is to create timeless, elegant photographs that you'll cherish forever.
weddings_essence_list_4: Final gallery delivered via private online link
weddings_legacy_list_4: Delivered via online gallery + external hard drive
maternity_intro: Capture the beauty of motherhood with our maternity content packages. We offer a range of services designed to document this special time in your life, from full content shoots to beautifully edited photos and videos. Whether you're looking for a single session or an extended package, we have options to suit your needs.
maternity_package_list_1: 1 full content shoot (on location, up to 3 hours)
private_intro: Our private event packages are designed to capture the essence of your special occasions, whether it's a birthday, anniversary, or any other milestone. We provide tailored photography and videography services to ensure that every moment is beautifully documented.
private_daily_list_1: 1 full content shoot (on location, up to 3 hours)
private_daily_list_2: 30 high quality edited photos (food, drinks, interiors, staff, BTS)
private_extended_list_1: 3 content shoots (1 per month, up to 3 hours each)
private_extended_list_2: 100+ high quality edited photos over 3 months
private_extended_list_5: Custom content calendar for social media use
